website_summaries.verdict: A moist carpet-cleaning formula that stops odors in their tracks.
pros: Handles funky smells along with stubborn dirt particles
Takes only 20 minutes to dry and leaves behind a nice scent
cons: May take several applications to remove old and set-in stains

customer_reviews.title: Makes goldenrod shag carpeting look fresh and clean
customer_reviews.text: I rent a house that is a little over 50 years old and it has the original goldenrod shag carpeting. I use this regularly on the carpets and whenever people come over, they are amazed at how clean the carpets look. The carpets are ugly, don't get me wrong. There is no way to make yellow shag carpeting look pretty, but they sure are clean-looking. The smell of the cleaner isn't overpowering either. So, if you have butt-ugly old carpeting that you want to give a spruce-up, this is an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Katyna K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Okay cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of carpet cleaners and this one is just okay. It’s probably good for newer carpet and fresh spills/stains/odors, but on our older carpet it doesn’t do very much. It helped with a fresher stain, but did absolutely nothing on older ones even letting it sit for quite some time. It did not have a strong smell and didn't do a lot to cover up anything.
customer_reviews.author: SmartShopper

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, bad for your vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: This might work for regular cleanings on high traffic areas, but do not use for pet stains/odor control. I've tried everything out there now and can't get the smell out of my carpet from an incontinent, elderly dog I had. I had hoped this would work, but it doesn't. And it wreaks havoc on your vacuum filters when you're done scrubbing with the brush and have to vacuum up the powder. I seriously doubt my vacuum will ever be the same. Very, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Spring

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER
customer_reviews.text: OH MY GOSH!!!! I have a white area rug that smelled like my dog. I bought this as a final resort. I was going to throw the dang rug outside because I couldn’t get the smell to go away. It is a long haired rug so using a normal carpet cleaner is hard. I used an entire bottle on the 8x10 rug. I did it in half sections as the directions indicated. 2 months later and my rug STILL smells fresh. My vacuum still picks up left over powder, but I’m okay with that because it smells great every time I vacuum. If you have a pet or children or just a hard smell- TRY THIS!!! It works.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Keep it on hand because sometimes you can't deep clean before your mother arrives!
customer_reviews.text: Helps not only to refresh carpets, but also to release pet hair. Sprinkle on and sweep or brush in, come back in 20 minutes and vacuum. Quick and easy no more smell or pet hair. I use this on every area rug I have and it works as well on a thick pile as it does on a textured carpet. I always keep it on hand because with pets you never know how often you will need it :) It is a sort of damp powder that pulls up smell as well as light stains from a dog that needs a bath :p
customer_reviews.author: Lildear

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and Clean
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product to refresh all the area rugs in our home. We steam clean our rugs regularly but they seem to never stay “fresh” smelling for long. We applied this powder to our rugs and vacuumed each one according to directions. Several days later the rugs still smell fresh and clean. Just cleaning the rugs was clearly not enough ... this product freshened and revived each rug. We have used other carpet fresheners before but they only covered the issue with fragrances. This product did an amazing job.
customer_reviews.author: fabulsME

customer_reviews.title: Never again.
customer_reviews.text: If you have pets and are looking to get something easy to clean your rug... LOOK SOMEWHERE ELSE. You have to let this crummy mess sit for 20 minutes after deeply brushing it into the rug (they do not provide any type of brush). Then vacuum it up. My rug was unable to Vaccum most of it (it got stuck to my floor and I had to use a wet wipe to get it off the ground). The rug smelt great but if I wanted that much hassle I would of just hand washed my rug.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Best product for cleaning stains out of carpet.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for several years and found it to be the best for removing stubborn stains. I used to get this carpet cleaner from Walmart but my local Walmart no longer carries it. I have pets and pets leave stains. It is just a fact of life. I sprinkle it on the stain, rub it in lightly with my hand, wait about a minute and the brush it in with a large, stiff brush. Then vacuum the residue. Voila! 99% of the time the stain is gone.
customer_reviews.author: debn

customer_reviews.title: OMG AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: We partition upstairs because one of the dogs wants to mark a specific room. I've noticed an awful dog p smell when I keep the door closed and this is my daughters room so it isn't okay. I ordered this hoping it would help. I sprinkled it on and scrubbed it in and left for around 1-2 hours came back and vacuumed it up. The spots came right up and the odor is completely gone. This stuff is beyond amazing. Definitely recommend if you have pets, dogs, kids and carpet!
customer_reviews.author: Monika Snow

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is some magical carpet hocus pocus clearner. I don't understand how this works but I'll be dammed it works. Took big stains (puppy ruined my carpet) I never thought would come out, after pouring the powder down and rubbing it in with a deck brush. Seriously I don't get it but it worked amazingly. I was gonna get new carpet but I rubbed this in and then shampooed them and it's like a new carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work! Get the spray foam!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a nice variation from their spay foam version, but I was so wrong! I’ve used the spray foam for years & was very satisfied with it. Since I adopted a puppy (who has accidents on my area rug) I was anxious to try something that didn’t have to dry so long. Turns out that this stuff becomes damp as you brush it into the carpet. It also had absolutely no effect on the smell or stain at all, no matter how long I let it sit. I’m definitely going back to the spray foam version!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany N.

customer_reviews.title: Carpet clean but vacuum a mess
customer_reviews.text: I used this product on an area rug in my living room. I live at the beach, and the product took longer to dry because of the humidity in the air. My rug looks clean and smells nice, but it made a mess of my bagless vacuum cleaner. The powder clings to every crevice and it's difficult to clean the canister after use. I may try to use another version of this product next time...perhaps the foam.
customer_reviews.author: fraulyn

customer_reviews.title: HOLY GRAIL FOR PET STAINS AND ODORS.
customer_reviews.text: I am Thoroughly impressed with this product. This rug took a lot of a beating with my new puppy over the last year and haven’t found a product that works quite like this. The dog odor sprays didn’t help (trust me I tried like 5) and baking soda made a mess. THIS PRODUCT IS THE HOLY GRAIL. It renewed the rug. I’m not a fan of the scent because it’s kinda strong but that being said I’ll take it over any dog smell. Especially it took old set in stains and smells out. My expensive white fluffy rug was saved from the trash with this product. Will repurchase. Do yourself a favor and BUY THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Samarin

customer_reviews.title: Works and user friendly.
customer_reviews.text: First time buying and using this product and it wasn’t bad. I don’t own a broom so I had to come in with my foot to spread it into the carpet. It’s wet to the touch which is both cool and weird. Also after if any pets or people walk across the space they leave white prints everywhere. So you’ll also be cleaning that up. Also make sure to clean your vacuum out as soon as your done!! You’ll have white powder everywhere for every if you don’t!
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This stuff worked way better than i expected!! I was just looking for a carpet cleaner with a nice scent. It was more of a heavy duty cleaner than i thought. It is a wet, somewhat clumpy powder. You put on carpet and then rub in with a soft bristled brush. Let it dry and vacuum. It got my carpets so clean. A tea stain i had given up on years ago came out. This is a great product
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, But messy
customer_reviews.text: I have three dogs and one cat. Sometimes they have accidents on the carpet, I used this product on all the carpets and it seems to work. This product has very little fragrance. But is very messy!!!! I just use the spray on all my carpets every 3 to 4 weeks let the spray dry then vacuum. That works “Great” for me!!! No odors!!!!:)
customer_reviews.author: penny

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. It’s dry - so be sure to shake and read directions - that’s all! Any on outer floor just wipe off. I use Bona cause I have wooden floors. My cat likes to throw up hair balls on one particular carpet we have and this gets stain out great without wetting and ruining my wooden floor under the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: LORI JOHNSON udate

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a film and partyicles are hard to totally get out.
customer_reviews.text: Resolve products are the worst. Never had luck with them. Decided to try this one for a last chance. They blew it. You don't wan't their "powder" around you and your pets. Asked for a refund. Horrible line of products. Some leave film on carpets that re-attract grime. Nothing but Folex or Oxy Cleaners from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea LaMattina

customer_reviews.title: Removed all evidence of Poopageddon
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is freaking AMAZING. My Bloodhound pulled open a drawer and got into the CBD oil. She ingested almost half the bottle. Slept like an angel that night. Then the next day. Oh, the next day. Got home from work and it smelled like Poopageddon and Pot. It was in a circle around her kennel and up the wall. I can't even describe how horrific it was. I used my upright carpet cleaner several times but couldn't completely get rid of the stains or stench. Ordered this stuff and only had to use it twice! Will never use anything else again!
customer_reviews.author: Niki L Gatewood

customer_reviews.title: Powder keeps it clean!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this powder for years on pet stains and other stains on my carpet. For organic spots like pet stains and even a few stomach bug situations, I typically spray a light coating of Oxy Clean first, let that sit for a few minutes, and then sprinkle this powder over the top and brush into carpet. After it dries, I vacuum the residue. I think that this powder cleans the carpet better than just a spray, and because it dries more thoroughly, it doesn't attract new stains to the same area. I have a hard time now finding it in stores, so I was happy to find it on Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: retrmuo

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff-Repeat Buyer
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. We have two puppies under the age of 6 mos and our carpet is frequently in need of some refreshing/spot cleaning. This is easy to use, doesn't have a super strong odor and works well. I recommend getting a stiff carpet brush to really brush it in.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous for traffic pattterns
customer_reviews.text: Amazing on berber carpet traffic patterns. I have had steam cleaning companies tell me they couldn't get the stains out. This did the trick. A little goes a long way. You will definitely want a stiff brush to brush the powder into the carpet. I let it sit for at least an hour and repeat. Did not take much time or effort and saved me a lot of money. Will definitely use again!
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. It only covers about one room but I could see an improvement and DEFINITELY helps with the smell. I got this when I noticed our carpet not only looked dirty (and its tan/light brown) but I was noticing it was starting to get a little doggy up there. This cleared everything up and I could see it definitely helped clean the carpet. Please note the carpet we currently have is cheap and very low to the ground, so I can not vouch for how well this works on deep carpeting.
customer_reviews.author: AmyJo13

customer_reviews.title: Made a mess
customer_reviews.text: I saw the reviews and thought I would take a chance on the product. I tried, very simple to use, but it really just mad a bigger mess. Didn't help with the smell. Didn't really make the carpet cleaner. Other cleaners have worked better.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: A great product that’s hard to find
customer_reviews.text: We have used this product for years. It is very effective and is the best product we have found for cleaning up liquid soils. It has become increasingly difficult to find this product in stores so having it available on Amazon is a great convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A. Campello

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: The Resolve Pet Carpet Cleaner Powder is absolutely marvelous. Truthfully, I have not had an “Event” that has not been addressed perfectly with this product. My neighbors are, now, true believers having used the powder on Wine stains, Pet accidents, and soiled carpet areas. Each of us recommend Resolve Pet Carpet Cleaner Powder and, now, ALL neighbors have it ready for use when necessary. Works wonders!
customer_reviews.author: WAS

customer_reviews.title: Great but barely anything in the bottle
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product with fast results, but this thing was less than half full. Was only able to use it on some parts of a small bedroom and a short hallway (pictured). Huge bottle is extremely deceptive.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Gets everything out
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Gets everything out, not just for pet problem. One time when it rained it got an antique chair wet and the stain on the chair legs got into the rug. After trying some other rugged cleaners with no luck, I dumped a pile of Resolve on the stain and rubbed in really well then let it sit for about a week -- I didn't even want to look it. I was sure the stain was permanent. But, when I vacuumed up the Resolve the stain was gone. If someone else told this, I probably would not believe.
customer_reviews.author: Boston

customer_reviews.title: Cleans as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Are used as indicated and was quite surprised atResults.I used only on traffic area In a couple of approximately 4 ft.2 areas used a brush to scrub in vacuum later to a much improved looking carpet. I do see dust like particles on vacuum.No allergies for me but those allergic to dust particles should probably wear a mask when using.
customer_reviews.author: Vena

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: No discernible difference to my carpet. I was eager to try this product after looking at the reviews, but was let down. The bottle came in a plastic baggie, however did not have an airtight seal underneath the cap. The powder wasn’t moist either. Pleasant smell, though. Not too strong, but doesn’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: Chinda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: One of the best products out there. Years ago it removed dried coffee stains in a vehicle I owned that had beige carpet. It’s still as good as ever. I have been using it ever since for carpet, rugs, and even some upholstery.
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: Best product I've every tried for pet urine odor
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews, but this product is that good! I have a male cat who urinated in three spots on my new carpet. I tried many products, multiple steam cleanings with enzyme cleaners and still couldn't get rid of the odor. I used this product once and to my delight the smell is gone!! I plan on following up in about a month just to be sure it doesn't come back, but I just ordered a second bottle to have on hand. Wonderful product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Steiskal

customer_reviews.title: Does it really work?
customer_reviews.text: I am well satisfied with its cleaning power. I bought it to use on a napless rug (Costco), backed by foam or similar substance, that is at the indoor garage door at the entry to the utility room. It gets very dirty there, especially because we back our car into the garage and the exhaust leaves tiny black stuff that sticks to shoes & the floor and gets on the rug. This product, used as directed, leaves it clean and looking new.
customer_reviews.author: Observer

customer_reviews.title: I have old carpet that has held pet smells for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have old carpet that has held pet smells for a while. I tried several things to help get the smell out. This actually worked. I was honestly surprised it did. Make sure you shake it up and brush it into the carpet and wait. I am not sure how much cleaner the carpet was ( it is old) but the dog smell was gone and a week later it is still gone. I will absolutely buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Crazy amount of hair removed!! I quick vacuumed before using this product then followed instruction and the amount of hair and dirt that came up was amazing! The room smelled so fresh and the carpet felt great. I tried it in to area rugs to and same result.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & easy carpet cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Love the dampness & 15 minute carpet or rug cleaner. All you need is a broom.Great for pet stains & odors or works great for quick carpet cleaner/ fresher.Then vacuum all away!
customer_reviews.author: Debra B Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. I didn’t expect it to work this well, honestly. Plus I let it sit well over the 20 mins. When the baby went down for nap, I left it on for little over 2hrs. It’s def couple shades lighter and will be doing this again
customer_reviews.author: Sk01896

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wool carpet.
customer_reviews.text: This product is used every year after the long MI winter. The local stores stopped carrying it so we had to resort to looking online. So glad Amazon had it. My husband will not use any other product on our carpets. He likes the powder best.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Sort of works, sort of makes things worse
customer_reviews.text: Despite vacuuming many times with a new bissell vacuum, this has had a lasting effect in a negative way. It was great for a last minute touch up, but future pet accidents have been impossible to get out after using this.
customer_reviews.author: London

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product For Removing Dirt And Ordors!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for removing dirt deep in the carpet! Resolve Pet Carpet Cleaner Powder also, left a pleasant scent which, made the rooms I used it in smell fresh and clean! I, highly, recommend this product and do not think you will be disappointed using it! :-)
customer_reviews.author: FlyGirl121

customer_reviews.title: extra steps
customer_reviews.text: I figured this was like previous carpet cleaning powder I bought where you just vacuum it up. You have to sprinkle it, let it sit, then sweep it into the carpet, then vacuum it. The extra step of sweeping it in the carpet is somewhat annoying.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Must have for puppys
customer_reviews.text: Best stuff ever used to get the scent of urine out if carpets and furniture. After getting 2 puppys and the awful time house training my house reeked of pee but this stuff got it out on the first try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, sprinkle,  work it into the carpet and vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff, used regularly on the high traffic areas on our light colored berber.. shake it on and let the family walk it in on their way back and forth. After all that's why it's a high traffic area. Vacuum up later in the day, it has done very well as routine maintenance instead of using a carpet cleaner/extractor.
customer_reviews.author: ELC

customer_reviews.title: Works well on carpets and removes odors
customer_reviews.text: Brushes into rug easily with a stiff broom or scrub brush. Really reduced pet odors. You will need more than one container for a medium to large size room. Vacuumed up easily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a very fair price
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I was training some foster kittens in how to use the litter box and they had a few small accidents. This cleaned up the spots and also took away the smell. You get a very large amount for the price also.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely best product out there for cleaning up nasty messes from ...
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely best product out there for cleaning up nasty messes from animal (s). You do need to get the carpet rake for deep cleaning and it does take time to dry. However, a professional cleaner cannot clean your carpets to your satisfaction for this price. Use some elbow grease, sprinkle the area and leave it alone to dry. Vacuum it up. It does clog the vacuum; so if you have a cheapie vacuum, it will ruin it. This is a must have item if you have any pets that have accidents. Buy extra! It does take more than estimated to clean up the messiest ares. (think kids and animals in hallways)
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Superb Product
customer_reviews.text: Just sprinkle on pet mess after you've blotted up the moisture, let it stand a few hours, then vacuum. It also works on spills and such. Easy and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Mudfarmer

customer_reviews.title: Great rug/carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Great product for refreshing carpet or area rugs. After using rugs look like new and smells fresh. My rug wasn’t heavily soiled but it needed to be cleaned. I will definitely order more. I use a scrub brush to get the results I need.
customer_reviews.author: Aj P

customer_reviews.title: Worked well but was really hard to get totally out ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well but was really hard to get totally out of the carpet. The powder also made a mess on my vacuum and caused it to spew up some powder every time I turned it on for a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Annalise Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Great for large areas
customer_reviews.text: great for large areas, but i cant' help wonder if I'm just masking the odors since you don't really feel like you are cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Lullabymom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I used it to clean stains on floor not made by pets and it worked great Will buy again Resolve is a great product
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne M LaDuke

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It always removes stains when other cleaners won’t. It seems hard to fine except online. Glad I found some. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Beebalm

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: I did like the smell better than the spray Resolve, after cleaning it seemed to stay smelling fresh longer. I used it for Dog pee, which his is strong. Sprinkle lightly a little goes a ways... Also used to clean old dried up cat vomit (hiding behind bed} sprinkled on waited and most came out first vacuum...I was impressed as it had been there awhile. Over all I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: Attracts cats to urinate...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on dog stains but it encouraged my CATS to urinate on the spots... Which they have never done. I'm annoyed and manufacturer was unhelpful.
customer_reviews.author: EtherTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This product works well and got stains and odors that were years old out of my bedroom carpet. It helped release ground in pet hair and made.my carpet look so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Reay Clan

customer_reviews.title: More value for our money
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't find in our local stores so glad we can get on here. The size was bigger to so more value for our money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My favorite carpet cleaner hands down!!! Pet stains on berber carpet? This is one of the best products I've found to get it out. Course, it does work better the fresher the stain, but has really helped on old stains that were not attended to timely, or were attempted to be cleaned by another product that didn't do the full job.
customer_reviews.author: tborland98

customer_reviews.title: Don't let it dry up before use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use,just shake up the bottle and sprinkle,and if you already have the brush for it,it makes it that much easier
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Deep Clean Magic
customer_reviews.text: I am speechless, absolutely amazing at getting rid of old set in pet stains. This product is a life saver and I will be buying more of this ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: The smell alone is great. We recently moved in a house that smelled ...
customer_reviews.text: The smell alone is great. We recently moved in a house that smelled of dog. Even after we had carpets cleaned professionally, the sMell lingered... It was so strong. I used this with a carpet brush to work it into carpet. Let it sit. And vacuumed.What a difference it made!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It didn't clean the carpet as I expected. I'll just have to rent one of those professional carpet cleaner vacuums from a store one point I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Kana

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I tried other ones cheaper and in a spray bottle and they did nothing compare to this one. Easy to use, wait only 20 min, no mess, just vacuum and you will get rid of the pee stain and it will leave a wonderful lemon smell.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Jarahian

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is beyond amazing. I have pets and this not only gets ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is beyond amazing. I have pets and this not only gets the stains out but neutralizes the odors! I buy it by the case!
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: My Go-To Carpet Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: In order for this product to work to the best of its abilities, I suggest using wide broom to really scrub the powder into your carpet and then let it sit for 15 minutes. It does an amazing job at removing the odors from carpet along with softening the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Julya

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well and dries fast
customer_reviews.text: I like having this on hand to keep area rugs clean and fresh. Easy to use, but be sure to really brush it in to get any stains out. And it dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: V. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: This is the best product to clean up pet accidents
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product to clean up pet accidents, especially urine. If pet urinates on carpet, cover the area with a fair amount of Resolve powder. Leave it set until dry (this may take a few days). The Resolve powder will absorb the urine and firm small yellow balls. I use a vacuum hose to pick up the balls before I vacuum over the are so they are not smashed into the carpet. It removes the stain and the smell almost entirely. I am totally sold on this and have been using it for years.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Jessup

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: This pulls stains to the surface and makes it a breeze to vacuum up. Almost the entire stain comes with it. Even a really bad and deep one.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Bond

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet owners in apartments
customer_reviews.text: This is the best. I have used it at the end of every home/apartment lease as an alternative to renting a carpet cleaner. While it won't get out many deep, dark stains, it does good at removing any pet odor and light stains. A must-have for any pet owner.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick White

customer_reviews.title: Gotta have it.
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about it. Simple to use, very effective. Better than the others.
customer_reviews.author: SinonBC

customer_reviews.title: Needs some elbow grease to work but it’s worth it
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on our living room rug that get heavy traffic. Our wood floors are very delicate so I wanted something that wouldn’t soak the rug to protect the hard wood floors underneath. This worked wonderfully! The only hard part is that I had to scrub the rug with a brush to get the powder worked into the rug so that it could clean properly. Will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product since they used to supply a terrific brush with it. It works very well in removing stains and leaves the rug with a nice fresh smell. I do worry a little bit about pets inhaling it so am careful to vacuum thoroughly after use.
customer_reviews.author: Quercus

customer_reviews.title: Cleans great!
customer_reviews.text: This works well. I used it to clean up after a puppy who wasn't housebroken. Shook out onto the floor then used my feet to push it into the carpet fibers. Let it sit for an hour and vacuumed it up. It didn't clog my vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: PAflyer

customer_reviews.title: Quick clean
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Having a lil problem getting it up all the way.
customer_reviews.author: S-Sh

customer_reviews.title: necessary pet product
customer_reviews.text: Just in time for our new puppy's needs! Glad to have it handy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product for my furniture also easy to clean and no wetness to dry
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stain remover
customer_reviews.text: In the past, I have had my carpet professionally cleaned and I even have a shampooer vacuum. I was in a pinch and short on time. This product removed stains that have existed through numerous cleanings over the past 10 years. Love! Will always have one in my cupboard. Works dramatically better than Resolve spray carpet cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: guetjk

customer_reviews.title: Yeah
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. Easy to put down vac up spot gone. No wet carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Home.12277

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This works really great! A product I have no trouble recommending.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: After many years of trying various products that did not work it was nice to discover Resolve Pet Carpet Cleaner. It's easy to use and does exactly what it claims...I also like that it doesn't go bad after opening and using a small amount. I wouldn't use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: kirk canfield

customer_reviews.title: was as described
customer_reviews.text: Did not work as well as I remember it did years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly McKay

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding for puppy accidents on carpet.
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner did an amazing job on our puppy stained carpet. I was shocked that it came out so clean.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Grant

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was really pleased with how well this removed odd stains on my carpet. Having a dog and a baby dragging food all over the house, stains appear all over. A little sprinkle and some scrubbing with a brush and 20-30minutes later, vacuum it up and the spot was gone!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Schran

customer_reviews.title: This works better than the other popular brand amazon
customer_reviews.text: You’ll need to order a ton of this stuff, but it works well and cleaned my deep shag carpet very well. Seems like it will need to be my new monthly routine if I wanna keep this 70s vibe going.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Patrick

customer_reviews.title: I wish it was still sold in stores!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for cat hair ball throw up. It works pretty well, but I’ve noticed area stains come back.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: I really like this carpet cleaner it seems to be very easy to use and it’s effective
customer_reviews.text: I really like this carpet cleaner it seems to be very easy to use and it’s effective
customer_reviews.author: randy merrill

customer_reviews.title: Great for pets
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great. My cat doesn't always throw up, but when she does, she prefers the carpet. This stuff along with a brush gets the stuff right out. Dump some of this stuff on your mess, brush it in real good, then vacuum it up in 30 minutes. Like it never happened. Essential for pet owners.
customer_reviews.author: Eric L

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have a pet, but I use it for traffic areas so I don’t have to drag out the shampooer. Because it’s dry powder you can use in cold weather. Easy to use... just brush it in, wait 1/2 an hour or so and vacuum it up.
customer_reviews.author: Sjay

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this product for several years It works great! We have two labs and it really helps if one becomes sick. Most places stopped stocking this. Good find.
customer_reviews.author: sobo13

customer_reviews.title: arrived perfectly
customer_reviews.text: this truly gets out every stain and leaves the nap in good shape, fresh scent
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Not good for old stains
customer_reviews.text: How well this product works is contingent on how hard you scrub the stain out. It's not just pour the powder, vacuum it up. It leaves the carpet nice and soft, and it vacuums up GREAT! It just didn't do wonders for old stains, and you have to scrub really hard regardless of how fresh the mess is.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Maruya

customer_reviews.title: This over several others
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cleaner we have found to get the carpets brighter and smelling better with a dog.
customer_reviews.author: swells

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Similar to Capture. Works very well to clean up stains from animals, e.g. hairball messes from cat. I just use a ShopVac first, then brush in a liberal amount of this product and it actually works. No stains, no residue. Also has an acceptably nice smell. Test carpeting first, it can remove some color from certain rugs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Magic
customer_reviews.text: This has been a game changer. I have a cat and dog and this has pulled up some old stains. I love that it's non toxic because my 18 month old is always rolling around on the floor
customer_reviews.author: Mp

customer_reviews.title: Powder stick after vacuuming
customer_reviews.text: It gets carpets clean but powder seems to still stick after vacuuming .
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This may be my second review for this product, but I just love it! It smells amazing and it jus takes some scrubbing, patience to let it work and then vacuuming. Definitely worth a try!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Carpets so fresh!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! There is nothing else on the market that compares. It cleans the carpet so well, second best to steam cleaning your carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gave me a headache?
customer_reviews.text: This product gave me a headache and made me feel ill for a few days. I think I used too much at once..but still. Not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: NA

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: We moved into a home where a dog had left his scent in the carpet in one of the rooms... :-( This stuff works wonders! The carpet no longer smells!
customer_reviews.author: TL in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I really like this much better than the liquid Resolve It takes a lot out of you follow directions The mixture of dawn, peroxide and baking soda is the absolute best.
customer_reviews.author: S. Collins

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works. Kind of a project to use. It is worth . Removes stains. Project because I end up doing the entire house. I love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Curious

product_meta.title: Resolve Pet Carpet Cleaner Powder, 18 oz Bottle, For Dirt Stain & Odor Removal
product_meta.description:
Size:18 Ounce (Pack of 1)Resolve Pet Deep Clean Powder lifts & removes tough ground in dirt, messes & odors left behind by pets.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


RESOLVE Pet Formula Carpet Cleaner Moist Powder with ODOR STOP Technology lifts and removes tough ground-in dirt and odors left behind by pets. ODOR STOP Technology eliminates pet odors, freshens with a light, clean scent, and discourages pet re-soiling.

Lifts and removes tough ground-in dirt and odors left behind by pets.
View larger

REMOVES PET ODORS
This moist powder carpet cleaner contains ODOR STOP technology to remove pet odors from carpets and leave behind a clean, fresh scent. The powder absorbs ground-in dirt and helps prevent repeat soiling.Simply sprinkle the powder on your carpet and use a soft brush to spread it across soiled areas. In as little as 20 minutes the powder will dry and can be vacuumed up, leaving your carpet clean, soft, and plush.

PET CARPET CLEANER FOR LARGE AREAS
Pet Formula Carpet Cleaner Moist Powder is specially formulated to easily and deeply clean large areas of carpet in homes with pets, such as living rooms, bedrooms, and family rooms. This formula safely cleans carpets, including stain-resistant carpets, and helps protect from future dirt and odors. It is not recommended for specialty carpets such as antique or oriental rugs.

WHY USE RESOLVE
Vacuuming alone won't pick up all the dirt trapped in your carpet. With RESOLVE products you can achieve a fast deeper clean without the inconvenience, expense, or complication of other deep cleaning methods. RESOLVE removes three times more dirt than vacuuming and freshening powders alone.* Whether you need to deep clean large or high-traffic areas, remove stubborn stains, or take care of pet odors and messes, you'll find an easy and convenient solution with RESOLVE products. 

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
RESOLVE Pet Formula Carpet Cleaner Moist Powder, 18 Ounces.

KEY FEATURES
 * ODOR STOP Technology eliminates pet odors
 * 3X more dirt removal than vacuuming alone*
 * Safely cleans and freshens, leaving carpets soft and plush 
 * Absorbs ground-in dirt and removes pet odors
 * Fast-working formula dries in as little as 20 minutes

MORE RESOLVE PET CARPET CLEANING PRODUCTS

Pet Formula Carpet Steam Cleaner Solution 2X Concentrate

Pet Stain Remover for Carpet

Pet Formula High Traffic Carpet Cleaner Foam


*Based on a scientific study using a proprietary test method to evaluate and compare the cleaning efficacy of RESOLVE Deep Clean Powder Carpet Cleaner versus using a vacuum cleaner alone. Testing was conducted in RESOLVE carpet laboratories in February, 2011.
